ClientImpl

Class ClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • ClientImpl.ClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChatClientInt, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ClientImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ChatClientInt
    This class represents the remote object of the client side. And it implements the chatClientInt interface.
    See Also:

      • notificationRequest

        public void notificationRequest(java.lang.String email,
                                int myid)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method handles the notification for the add friend feature. It receives a notification and calls the notification() method in the main controller HomeController to view the notification on the screen
        Specified by:
        notificationRequest in interface ChatClientInt
        Parameters:
        email - email address of the notification receiver
        myid - id of the notification sender
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • receiveFileRmi

        public void receiveFileRmi(com.healthmarketscience.rmiio.RemoteInputStream ris,
                           java.lang.String fileName)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method receives a file over RMI using RMIIO library and it prompts the user to accept or decline the file transfer. In case of acceptance the method calls the writeToFile() method passing to it the necessary parameters
        Specified by:
        receiveFileRmi in interface ChatClientInt
        Parameters:
        ris - a remote input stream is used to transfer files over RMI
        fileName - the name of the file to be received
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - /

      • receive

        public void receive(MessageDTO msg)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This methods handles the process of receiving a message. Its calls the setmsg() method in the chat window controller ChaaatController. And passes the message object as a parameter.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface ChatClientInt
        Parameters:
        msg - the message object to be received
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
